Name: Big Breezy Boat - Relaxing Sailing
About the game: Be free and go sailing on your own yacht surrounded by relaxing ocean! You can steer, control the sails and teleport around the boat. Meet others sailors in an optional multiplayer mode. Cross-platform multiplayer with Oculus Go. Features Relaxing single-player sailing mode with day-night cycle. A simple tutorial introducing basic yacht controls. Optional multiplayer mode. Sail with others on the same yacht and share boat handling responsibilities with your crew. Communicate via build-in voice chat. Cross-platform multiplayer with Oculus Go, Quest and Rift! 'Treasure hunt' mode VR only! Requires a virtual reality headset. See the VR Support section for more info. Be free, go sailing! PS. If you are looking for more comprehensive introduction to sailing ( including racing ), you may like VR Regatta - The Sailing Game more.
